name: ガーディアンズ
summary: Guardians (ガーディアンズ), also known as Denjinmakai II (電神魔傀II), is a side-scrolling beat 'em up developed by Winkysoft and published by Banpresto that was exclusively released as a coin-operated arcade game in 1995 as the successor of the 1994 arcade game Denjinmakai.
info:
• 中文名: 电神魔傀2
  • 发行: BANPRESTO
  • 别名: 电精2
  • 别名: 電神魔傀II
  • 别名: GUARDIANS
  • 别名: Denjinmakai II
  • 别名: Denjin Makai II
  • 平台: ARC
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 1995年
  • 开发: ウィンキーソフト (Winkysoft)
